title: Recruit_Disembark
summary: [Character 1] steps off the stagecoach and arrives in the Hamlet.

title: Recruit_Crier
summary: The town crier announces [Character 1]'s arrival to the Hamlet.

title: Recruit_Boat
summary: [Character 1] arrives to the Hamlet by means of a small boat.

title: Recruit_Graveyard
summary: [Character 1] appears mysteriously in the Hamlet's graveyard, discovered by the Caretaker.
